= libftdi =

USBGecko needs the libftdi (http://www.intra2net.com/en/developer/libftdi/index.php). Current Ubuntu 10.10 version is 0.18-1, that still has the Python binding bug present - can not use 'unsigned int *' type. See http://developer.intra2net.com/mailarchive/html/libftdi/2010/msg00362.html.

To overcome this issue one needs to manually patch the libftdi 0.18 sources (or use GIT sources).

Here I'm hosting the libftdi 0.18 Ubuntu 10.10 source package + latest (28 Mar 2011) GIT sources. The tree can be compiled directly to Ubuntu DEB package - see Ubuntu-README.txt.
